about_the_game:
You wake up alone, surrounded by wilderness; the only things keeping you sane are the voices in your head. It becomes clear to you civil society is over but you can't seem to remember how. In truth you can't seem to remember much of anything. The only thing you can do is push forward. After all, why argue with the strange voices in your head?

The corruption becomes you!

Key features

  • Kill zombies to gain crystals used to power up each time you die.
  • Defend points of interest from zombie hordes by crafting traps and towers
  • Search buildings and bunkers for valuable items and resources
  • Craft weapons and armor to better defend yourself from the hordes
  • Control and manipulate zombies as you become more corrupted
  • Sneak past traps and hide using stealth

name: Grave Complex Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.1 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: The post-apocalyptic survival, tower-defense rogue-lite. Gather resources, set up defenses and protect critical points from the amassing hordes.
